review:
A really fun arcade-style beat 'em up with great combat. The campaign is really short though, and the story isn't really interesting, but the game more or less makes for it with a survival mode, and having various characters, unlockable characters, and difficulties that give it replay value. The soundtrack's decent, too.

Also, you play as the Nostalgia Critic.

author: {'steamid': '76561199441881845', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 19, 'playtime_at_review': 302, 'last_played': 1711318835}
review:
Extremely underrated game. It may look like a joke, but then you realize how fluid and satisfying the combat system is, along with the extremely creative cast of characters and move sets for each



And yes, the Nostalgia Critic does have some epic combos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198109724497', 'num_games_owned': 416, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 277, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1707876855}
review: Um compilado de aloprados dignos de personagens de Kasumi Ninja, Way of the Warrior, Survival Arts e Dong Dong Never Die que mereciam um jogo um pouco mais elaborado, visto que as fases são ultra simples com vários inimigos repetidos e ao invés de andar livremente na tela, você geralmente se movimenta entre 3 planos, parecido com Fatal Fury, o que cria um misto de beat'em up com 1x1. Apesar dos pesares, para quem não é exigente e curte um estilo trash, vale a pena pegar uma promo dele para abusar de combos viciantes e morrer de rir dos movimentos escrotos. Diverte mais do que muito beat'em up atual por aí.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027821997', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1697591616}
review:
This game is wild. It's like Pit Fighter if Pit Fighter had great hit detection, belt scrolling, and a ton of characters each with a whole lot of attacks. Stringing together combos is insanely fun, and the whole crazy low budget feel with live action characters and terrible voice acting brings it all together. 

Like, seriously, it thought of everything. Stamina meter so you can't just block everything and get guard crushed. Tie it to your special moves so you can fire them off a bunch but open yourself up to getting punished hard. Parry system that drains your stamina, so use it wisely. Getting smashed by a combo? Wait for the Counter meter to build and press the button to break out. Tech rolls from ground or air. Three-tier "2d" fighting that feels fast, compared to the long hops in stuff like Guardian Heroes. Neutral, up, forward, and down regular, jump, and super attacks, with a launcher mixed in. 

I'm just sad I found this thing apparently 8 years after release.

author: {'steamid': '76561199248084131', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 386, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1705014372}

author: {'steamid': '76561198136647171', 'num_games_owned': 7345, 'num_reviews': 277, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1696026236}
review:
[h1]Paris is burning[/h1]
Un "yo contra el barrio" que parodia el estilo de los juegos noventeros.

Lo que hace especial a "Streets of Fury EX" son las capturas digitalizadas de imagen real que ya vimos en juegos de lucha como "Mortal Kombat" o [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/546390/Brief_Karate_Foolish]"Brief Karate Foolish"[/url] pero en este caso con mejor resolución de los sprites.

Tiene una variedad de animaciones para cada personaje que no me esperaba pero me parece raro el tener usar dos botones para pasar del plano de fondo al de frente (o viceversa) a modo de salto. 

Si lo pillas de oferta y te gustan este tipo de juegos es buena opción coop con amigos (hasta 4).

[u][b]Pros[/b][/u]:
✔️ El humor paródico del juego
✔️ Resolución y suavidad de los sprites
✔️ Variedad de movimientos

[u][b]Contras[/b][/u]:
❌ El manejo al plano frontal

Nota: [b]7,9/10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198155730024', 'num_games_owned': 1016, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1690872347}
review:
세일해서 꽤 싸게 샀던걸로 기억하는데. 일단 캠페인 플랜 A를 깼습니다. 솔직히 이거 구매할까 고민하실 정도라면 게임성이 어떨지 정도는 다 예상하셨잖아요? 그런데 생각보다 액션이랄까 모션이 꽤 각자마다의 개성이 있고 보는 맛이 있습니다. 조작도 매우 심플합니다.

하지만 역시나 게임성이라거나 보스 디자인은 참 구립니다. 조금 비합리적이라고 느껴지는 보스들부터(그냥 내가 못하는걸수도 있음) 양각 잡히면 아무것도 못하는 개억까존도 있고. 실사로 재밌게 만들어졌다 빼고는 장점을 잘 모르겠음. 그래도 짧게 정도는 재밌게 할 수  있기에 비추는 안함.

결론: 똥겜도 사랑하는 사람이라면 추천.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118263896', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 633, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 484, 'last_played': 1688906130}
review:
A game that doesn't take itself seriously, with EXACTLY the right amount of intentional jank. The badly cut out actors, the ridiculous moves and poses, THE GODDAMN COSTUMES!! I have no explanation for how entertaining and enjoyable i find that. 

All of the presentation screams clunkyness, but to my surprise, the game controls so well and is just a fair challenge. 

Absolutely recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116700842', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1693023382}
review:
Game is amazing. Pit-fighter meets streets of rage, monty python, and a silly french cast. Every time I play this, I discover something bonkers. I'm fairly certain they pasted Aaron Paul's (from breaking bad) head on a playable character.

I got this key in a bundle. After I played less than 5 mins, I bought 4x keys for friends.

The only negative is its local coop only and I have spent hours with friends on discord trying to set up and troubleshoot a remote play session.  I've done remote play on tons of games, its never worked on this game. Bummer.... its a crazy time single player, but I think itd be funnier with friends... same way I feel about Broforce.

author: {'steamid': '76561199153521302', 'num_games_owned': 326, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1689741204}
review: Streets of furry is very fun in co-op and normal don’t let the arcade looking mortal kombat style turn you away because it’s a really fun beat ‘em up and with the inclusion of the nostalgia critic it makes this very fun as he is my favorite character in the game now this game is very combo heavy and does get brutally hard towards the end but that makes it fun cause if it was easy the game would be over in seconds since the campaign is really short but despite all of that streets of fury is a love letter to beat ‘em up fans and this game is heavily underrated and I think everything should try it 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198116731423', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1685244212}
review:
Review PT-BR e EN-US

Uma palavra: UNDERRATED. Como esse game não é mais conhecido? Não tenho palavras pra explicar o quanto é divertido. Jogar com 4 amigos é garantia de risos infinitos. 

O gameplay é estranhamente profundo pra um jogo que a princípio parece piada. Imagine uma versão maconhada de Streets of Rage, mas ainda mais divertido. Dá pra jogar coop ou contra, +20 personagens, todos com golpes únicos e hilários.

10/10

-------

In English:

I've always found the concept of "hidden gem" kind of annoying. No amazing game can be that unknown, right? Until I found SoF. I have no words to explain how fun it is. Playing with 4 friends guarantees endless laughs. The gameplay is strangely deep for a game that at first seems like a joke. It's like playing a stoned version of Streets of Rage, but on steroids.

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198223207308', 'num_games_owned': 1516, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1579278684}
review:
実写取り込みというだけでおバカゲーに見えるかも知れないが、非常に丁寧に作ってある３WAYベルトアクションゲー
２４人もプレイアブルキャラがおり、皆個性的なムーブをするので毎回キャラ変してプレイしたくなる
PVでも紹介されているが、格ゲーばりの連続コンボが可能なシステムになっており、キャラの技も豊富にそろっている

これで４人co－opなんてやるともう画面はハチャメチャになりそうだが、どうもローカルco－opしか実装されていないらしい…が！リモートプレイトゥギャザー対応と書いてあるので、オンラインco-opも恐らく出来るハズ(要確認)
確認したら追記します

エネミーもかなり個性的なヤツらばかりなので、一筋縄では先に進めないだろう（特に剣道マン）
セールの時は大分安くなるので、気になるならとりあえずウイッシュに入れとき！

author: {'steamid': '76561198841757076', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1673427924}
review:
一款爽快的横版动作游戏，音乐带感。
虽然画面不么怎样，剧情基本没有，部分人物动作很尬，但打击感却意外地不错。
游戏里有个挑战模式很好玩，全3星难度并不高。
我尝试过所有角色，最喜欢其中一个叫The Nostalgia Critic的。他攻击距离长，出手快，连击高，大招强，还能远距离开枪，十分全能。

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 1913, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1913, 'last_played': 1666360315}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Beat ’em up с живыми актерами и живыми локациями. Это ооооооочень необычная в плане подачи игра, где герои и враги это записанные видео ролики, затем обработанные и впихнутые в игру. По самой игре - куча персонажей и у каждого с десяток своих супер-ударов. Есть закрытые персонажи, что дает реиграбельность ради новых открытий. Всего в игре 2 компании с несколькими видами сложностей, а также есть несколько челенджей и режим выживания. Но интересно играть как раз таки в компании. Музыка отличная. Озвучка отличная. Графика отличная. Геймплей отличный. Тут все отлично как вы уже поняли... Почему тогда не максимальная оценка? А потому, что меня расстроил очень сильно один косяк... Игра пишет, что имеет полную поддержку контроллера, но мой логитеч на стимлинке не подцепило и даже ручками настроить не удалось... Хотя в 99% других игр все работает даже там где не должно. Тут не полная поддержка контроллера, а частичная... И пришлось играть не на телеке, а на ноуте, что сильно испортило планы и впечатление. 

[h1]Оценка: 8/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
[quote] Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в кураторку
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/8114152] К и Ко [/url], там много других, хороших обзоров.
[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198128118565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 3052, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2962, 'last_played': 1698041459}
review:
For me, a game having such a silly, light-hearted appearance, while also playing like something I'd expect from more serious titles, is a rare sight. From the people who would later go on to co-develop Streets of Rage 4, comes a fighting game-influenced beat 'em up where you can juggle the crap out of bosses and even your friends in versus matches. After you have your laughs and frustrations running through the campaign, extra content in the form of unlockable characters, survival and training modes, challenge levels, and a new campaign should keep you coming back for a good while. Excellent bang for your $3-10.
Couple important things worth noting: launch the OpenGL version for better controller support, and use Block+Jump to perform an invincible backdash, don't think the game mentions that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053060154', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1660612948}
review:
While it looks like a shoddy meme game, Streets of Fury EX is actually a lovingly crafted meme masterpiece. A cross between classic Mortal Kombat and the beat 'em ups of old, the game plays well while providing an healthy dose of hilarity. The special moves are particularly entertaining. It's very French, but like, in a good way.
It doesn't take itself seriously, yet it's still of high quality. Something taken for granted these days.

I'll be coming back to this one... in 10 years.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163677992', 'num_games_owned': 194, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 978, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 525, 'last_played': 1693456033}
review:
There is a reason why ultimate attacks in video games have invincibility frames, its because its a last resort when you are f*cking crowded with swarms of enemies. Why do game devs hate invincibility frames ? They act like invincibility frames short their dog or something. Also, why the f*ck must I be punished for countering and teching ? If I tech a swarm of enemies, I get no invincibility frames to attack or use my ultimates so instead I get combo'd to death. Its so stupid how countering consumes your entire stamina. Imagine playing Dark Souls and countering or parrying an attack consumes your entire stamina. Go play DMC or Bayonetta, at least sh*t is fair when fighting swarms of enemies.

Traduction française puisque les développeurs sont français :

Il y a une raison pour laquelle les attaques ultimes dans les jeux vidéo ont des cadres d'invincibilité, c'est parce que c'est un dernier recours lorsque vous êtes bondé d'essaims d'ennemis. Pourquoi les développeurs de jeux détestent-ils les cadres d'invincibilité ? Ils agissent comme des cadres d'invincibilité court-circuitant leur chien ou quelque chose comme ça. Aussi, pourquoi diable dois-je être puni pour avoir contré et teching? Si je tech un essaim d'ennemis, je n'obtiens aucun cadre d'invincibilité pour attaquer ou utiliser mes ultimes, donc à la place, je me fais enchaîner à mort. C'est tellement stupide de voir comment contrer consomme toute votre endurance. Imaginez que vous jouez à Dark Souls et que contrer ou parer une attaque consomme toute votre endurance. Allez jouer à DMC ou Bayonetta, au moins c'est juste quand on combat des essaims d'ennemis.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994002775', 'num_games_owned': 6538, 'num_reviews': 1438, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1650592615}
review:
Since the dawn of video games, there has always been some sort of "innocent" thrill in bludgeoning random criminals to death.
Being able to pick up a guy with his big boy pants and then throw him in the air is something every gamer could ever enjoy.
While some titles of this genre such as double dragon can compete for many years on the racetrack of the video game world, there are many of these great 2D brawlers that don't make it to the finish line in which the titles take decades to maybe even a century, and even if it doesn't we get a great, sometimes, Beat 'em up smasher like Streets Of Fury EX.

In this game you have a wide variety of characters that you can choose with each their style and attacks,
these characters are, a bit like in the classic Mortal Kombat games, recordings of real 'actors' who also combined every movement in the game in front of a green screen, so it's best to check and try each character.

Check out some gameplay here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lnWo4bDhrTo

author: {'steamid': '76561198013866056', 'num_games_owned': 2640, 'num_reviews': 309, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1644214710}
review:
An update of an older Xbox Live Indie title (indie marketplace for the 360) that uses digitized actors as the playable and enemy characters in a beat em up. Over 20 characters to play as with their own combos and special attacks, with many of them also appearing as enemies. Many of the characters likely being friends of the developers but some being related to esports or internet personalities, so if you ever wanted to beat up Paris street gangs as the Nostalgia Critic, for some reason, you can do that.

Looking at the game you would assume it would be terrible but the attacks flow and animate fairly well, the combat is heavily combo focused with you having a light, heavy, and more powerful stamina (stamina relating to your ability to block not your health) using attack that changes style if you are stationary or holding up, down, or forward, you can block and parry, dodge, jump between three lanes like in Guardian Heroes, and build up fury to unleash three different special moves per characters.

Enemy types have a bit more variety than you would expect as they tend to fight differently and have different colored outlines that can signify different power levels or behavior.

Not amazing but fun for a bit, a lot deeper mechanically than I would have thought. Developer went on to work on Streets of Rage 4 that I thought was one of the best beat em ups I've played so surprising amount of talent here.

Screenshots: https://twitter.com/Legolas_Katarn/status/1490583156310765570

author: {'steamid': '76561198009634062', 'num_games_owned': 1058, 'num_reviews': 406, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1645163232}
review:
Yeah wow, the others are right. I don't know any of the memes related to this game and have no bias for wherever the heck this game came from, but gosh DANG it is a fine fighter, Absolutely pick it up, the amount of playable charters, combos, special moves... I legitimately don't know how they did it for a studio of this size. I dusted off (literally) my fight stick for this and it was totally worth it. 

Just wish I could hear what the players are saying, they are really quiet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020804059', 'num_games_owned': 1830, 'num_reviews': 398, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1637006413}
review:
А! 
ААА!
ААААА!
Это просто офигенно! Без лишних слов - берите если любите не сложные битемапчики. Что? Что там такого хорошего? Ну давайте разбираться.

[code]Вступай в [url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/DreamsofGenesis]группу[/url] и [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/11769719/]кураторку[/url], если понравилось читать отзыв. [/code]

Да боевка тут выглядит так:
В отличии от большинства битемапов, тут боевая зона состоит из 3 линий между которыми нужно перемещаться. Но это открывает одно интересное решение в плане комбо ударов.
Если в большинстве битемапов идут только простейшие комбо: удар, удар+вперед, удар+рывок.
Тут у нас комбо: удар, зажать вперед\вниз\вверх и удар. Но самое клевое, что игра позволяет красиво перейти из допустим комбо вверх+удар на комбо вниз+удар. 
Приплюсовать к этому что у персонажей есть ещё усиленные удары, которые так-же делятся на верх\низ\вперед\обычный, и они тоже могут вплетаться в комбо. 
А ещё есть приемы - и они точно так-же делятся на...ну вы поняли.
И поверх этого у каждого перса есть ещё по 3 спец ульты которые тратят шкалу заполняющуюся от нанесенного урона.
И они тоже могут быть красивым продолжением комбо.

Визуал. Он...необычный. Все в наше время делают визуал одним из 3х видов. 1 Максимальные пиксели. 2 Рисованный. 3 Полноценные модельки.
Но Тут авторы такие - у нас есть блекджек и ш*юхи! 
И делают игру похожую на самый первый МК. Ну когда спрайты представляют собой не нарисованных персонажей, а фотки друганов в разных угарных нарядах. 
И бл*ть это работает! Большинство битемапов не могут запомниться ни как. Но такая вот х*рня(в хорошем смысле) я думаю западет в память на долго.

И раз уж мы поговорили о комбо, поговорили о визуале. Я думаю стоит зацепить ещё одну важную часть в битемапах - персонажи. Тут их много, и они очень харизматичные.
Я лично для себя выделил нескольких.
1 Фауст - чувак в перчатках и забавной шапке-панамке. Немного медлительный, но компенсирует это тем что у него очень легко удары перетекают из одного в другой.
2 Квак - толстячек который очень нагло плагиатит Бланку из серии SF
3 Демон - чувак который умеет делать муда-муда! И в довесок имеет очень угарный комбо лист.
4 Критик - не ну это как удар ниже пояса. Взять и впихнуть в игру Ностальгирующего критика.

В общем игра - пушка. Игра - огонь!
Спасибо [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TomokoKuroku] Lize's future husband [/url] за такой клевый подгон.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020791719', 'num_games_owned': 198, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 12557, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12152, 'last_played': 1677092869}
review:
This is easily one of the best brawlers that I've ever played, and thus is most certainly one my favorites, and this is a statement that I don't make often. It's the only beat'em up I know of where half the fighter roster is comprised of hilarious perverted french youtubers and popular faces in the fighting game genre, and every single one is a blast to play (including The Nostalgia Critic, which is an immediate +1). Each fighter has a unique set of moves that can be manipulated with skill and memory to chain together some wickedly long combos that are a joy to behold. The graphics are a cool live action style, the music is awesome, the enemies varied, and there are several different modes to test your mettle. Add increasing difficulties to challenge yourself against and you have a game that has great replay value.

And let's face it: the game is hilarious. I had several laugh out loud moments, and I'm sure you will too. The fun factor is high, and the game is totally worth the asking price. Buy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985650673', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 708, 'last_played': 1658113360}
review:
Excellent example of why not to judge a book by its cover. If you can get past the goofy digitized sprites and low-detail visuals/presentation, Streets of Fury offers a remarkably deep and complex combo system, reminiscent of (but not QUITE the same as) fighting games like Marvel vs Capcom, Guilty Gear, or Skullgirls. You have a wide variety of characters who all usually have a good selection of moves, potential combo routes, and juggles, and the system is generous enough to let you improvise from time to time, giving you some room for creativity as you kick butt through the levels.

I have virtually no attachment or recognition for the characters themselves, and hence feel nothing for any fanservice contained therein (although there is a sense of humor that I appreciate), but there are very few games of the beat-em-up genre that are as engaging to play, learn, and master. There are also few breaks in the action; there is hardly any story, no dialogue, and you can rapidly fast forward every 'cutscene' so you're always going from fight to fight. Enemy variety is also pretty good, and although palette swaps are commonly used, they are usually substantially different in behavior and actions compared to the base enemy type.

My only major criticism is that there is just not a lot of content. Aside from some minor extra modes, there are two campaigns, one shorter and easier, the other longer and more difficult. You can clear the campaigns in different difficulties, which do change enough to make the campaigns more replayable, but there isn't much to do if you're not looking for repeatable content. Of course, with the combat being so lovingly-crafted and enjoyable, and the campaigns being so brisk and fat-free, it doesn't need it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992764918', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 428, 'playtime_forever': 594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1666920422}
review:
Waka waka! Waka waka!

In all seriousness, this side scrolling beat em up is an absolute blast, especially with friends. Fun combo mechanics, every character is unique and music be BUMPIN! Works flawlessly with Steam's Remote Play.

Totally recommend.

I hope to see a sequel one day where they add ultra specials (use up all 3 bars for one crazy super) and team specials.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11207, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1695306267}
review:
This is a console ported arcade versus/fighter game with the unusual decision to use full motion video captures of the fighters, much like Mortal Kombat used to do.    It works surprisingly well, although the game doesn't take itself very seriously.  I went into this expecting the typical type of indie garbage I'm used to, but as a fighter/versus game it's tolerable. 

The combos are fairly deep and the developers are clearly experienced at the genre, with more depth than most arcade fighter games have, with a lot of counter measures and limiters to prevent single "cheap" strategies from dominating the gameplay.   Combat was much more satisfying than I thought it would be. 

The game is very well fleshed out and there's a fair amount of content for players to enjoy as well as co-op and multiplayer modes, making this feel more complete than most bundleware is.   I think this is worth picking up for fans of fighting games, when it's on sale or in a bundle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198369912374', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 127, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1616859517}
review:
Boring but solid gameplay with a cheap FOX news lore.
Like most of Beat Them All, it's excessively repetitive.

Gameplay is solid, it's a classic modern beat them all with guard crush, parry, specials, juggle...
You have a lot of moves and chain possibilities unlike Street of rage or Scott Pilgrim.

Its a plane system : fIghting on 3-2-1 plane(s).
imho its preferable to have a button to change planes and up and down for jump and crouch, this is not the case here.

There's some Youtuber like The Nostalgia Critic or Specialized fighting games youtuber/streamer like Kayane or MrQuaraté.

It's just a proof of concept and a joke game, it's not "beautiful", nor stylized or with elegant movements like digitalized characters on mortal kombat (they're Fighters pro on MK tho), most of them are not fighters but just joke characters, it's funny at first.

Dress code : inexistant.

Animation transition or link are very bad, they reversed some idle animations.
Unlike this https://forums.ultra-combo.com/uploads/default/original/3X/6/c/6cf91ba5d704f7a222641fc3bb21bee238f9dfb4.gif
or https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/mkwikia/images/d/db/Jcmk2.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/69?cb=20091003212807 

Overall, the game is not polished imo.

BUT, its the work of two guys for Xbox Arcade, it's cool... yet i have to be honest, it's boring for me after 20minutes and the backgrounds are lifeless.

But on Discount you should buy it, you can have a lot of fun with friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038776903', 'num_games_owned': 7260, 'num_reviews': 3814, 'playtime_forever': 190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 190, 'last_played': 1614393220}
review:
[table][td][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/30253125]甄游组鉴赏家（点击订阅） [/url] [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/34433893]玩家聊天Q群124925250[/url][/td][/table]

你可以一个人疯，但很难有一群朋友陪你一起疯。
这款游戏实在太太太有趣了。这才是真正的真人快打。每个角色肢体语言个性十足，有的酷炫、癫狂、可爱、搞笑。
在战斗和打击感方面，连招快感方面，绝对超赞，以我个人感受来说完全碾压怒之铁拳4。
通关后还有二周目B模式和多种待解锁模式。
二周目B模式会有更多AI队友参战，让我体会到了当年MD幽游白书无限连招的快感，且远不止4人的大规模群战。太多核心战斗元素让开发组理解的淋漓尽致。我可以毫无保留的给这个游戏赞誉，并致以最崇高的敬意。
这款游戏让我非常感动，看这一群朋友，打打闹闹，成功制作了这款归于乐趣本质的神奇佳作。
最多本地四人联机。支持手柄。

试玩演示
https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1HK4y1D7YL

author: {'steamid': '76561198029034048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1613284816}
review:
As far as Arcade Side-Scrolling Beat-Em-Ups go, this one has got to be the silliest I have ever played. As you can see, the game makes use of digitized photos of real human actors (Mortal Kombat 1 style) to portray playable characters and the background art are photographs of real world locations.

There are alot of playable characters to choose from and their movesets are basically a wide spectrum of ultra goofiness. You can even unlock more characters to play as you progress through the game. Its definitely doesn't take itself seriously and Its really entertaining to see some of the insane movesets the characters can do.

Movement and responsiveness is speedy and its easy to rack up high combos and even more entertaining to see the crazy ways your character can go about doing it. Its so ridiculously funny to watch sometimes.

I enjoyed the music which consists of a mix of Eurodance and Synth-Pop. Sound effects are also appropriately goofy as you'd expect this game to be. Played this game on Couch Co-Op with a couple of friends and we enjoyed the experience.

Downsides, the game is quite short at around 2 hours. While the game is obviously extremely goofy, some people may not like the randomness it presents. Also, you cannot change characters to try anytime you wanted during the game unless your current one completely loses his/her lifebar. 

Overall Rating: 8 / 10
An extremely goofy and crazy take on the Side-Scrolling Beat-Em-Up genre. If you are looking to spice things up and don't mind how extremely goofy and random this game is, definitely pick it up during a sale. Its perfect for a short Co-Op Party to laugh with the lads over some beer.

review:
Nostalgia Critic is a playable character. Make of this what you will.

A pretty balanced but demanding beat-em-up reminiscent of older arcade games. Features a TON of combos and fighting game mechanics. Loads of depth in terms of gameplay, but I SUCK at fighting games, so I only scraped through the campaign once in multiplayer. 
An amazing centerpiece with company over. The live action Mortal-Kombat-esque characters give the entire game a cheesy vibe that always makes me smirk. I love it.

review: The most immersive, eco-friendly, light-hearted, family friendly, very politically correct game that is appealing for anyone. I cannot recommend this game enough it's got a super deep lore, complex but easy to master controls and rewarding gameplay that makes you feel like the person you're playing as. Truly one of the best games on planet earth. If you haven't played this yet you're doing a great disservice to everyone in your family. 11/10 -IGN

author: {'steamid': '76561198293703917', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 778, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 778, 'last_played': 1584345669}
review:
Streets of Fury EX is the most interesting game to play. The controls are very easy to use. The combos are completely fast phased and the first time ever never in my life I have seen a beat em up game like this before. It completely has camera shots of real life people just like the old Mortal Kombat games and at first glance it looks pretty fake and poorly made but when you play it is amazing and completely out of this world. The 2 Campaigns are really good and enjoyable to play but this game but needs a little bit more lore into this because I get in in Pact A but Pact B feels the same

Still though I completely enjoyed this game

author: {'steamid': '76561198062948437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1644102818}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028970904', 'num_games_owned': 262, 'num_reviews': 146, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1606182359}
review:
[h1]Streets of Fury EX:[/h1]
Брал эту игру несколько лет назад по скидке, чтобы поугорать на своём стареньком ноутбуке, но руки так и не дошли. Со временем потерял интерес к данному жанру в рамках современных игр и пародий на ретро битэмапы. Но в этом году все же решил запустить и посмотреть что было мной куплено тогда, и как это будет восприниматься сейчас. Игра представляет собой простенький и довольно упоротый битэмапчик, эдакая ретроспектива на старенькие игры, в которых многие из нас зависали часами со своими друзьями. Весь геймплей - это копия классических битэмапов, поэтому здесь сказать особо нечего. Есть и разные персонажи со своей ультой и стилем боя, многочисленные враги, интересные боссы, разнообразные уровни. В общем, ничего особенного, обычные плюсы, которые идут в копилку этому трешу. Запомнился саундтрек - привет из нулевых. Минусов почти нет, ведь сложно придираться к инди проекту, который ни на что не претендует и был заведомо создан таким кривоватым, это его "типа" фишка. Чего не хватает для жирного плюса - это хотя бы какого-то цельного, пусть и трешового (для галочки) повествования-сюжета, ну да ладно...

Главной особенностью игры является визуальная составляющая, которая и привносит львиную долю угарности, положительных эмоций и юмора в этот битэмап. Все движения, это чёткие нарезки записей движений реальных людей на камеру. Многие помнят как создавалась классика того же "Mortal Combat", так вот, это оно и есть. Только здесь персонажи и их способности состоят из кринжовых наборов движений. Да и вся картина в целом выглядит довольно нелепо, ввиду этого заставляет улыбнуться и в каких-то моментах приорать над происходящим.

Подводя итоги: Если в вас по какой-то причине проснулась ностальгия по ретро битэмапам, вы любите поугарать, не стесняетесь треша - это игра для вас. "Streets of Fury EX" стоит опробовать, так как он все глубже теряется в море трешовых игр Steam на момент 2к20 года. От этого битэмапа просто веет концом 90-х и началом нулевых, так что берите с собой друга, доставайте геймпады и вперед - пару вечеров эта игра вам точно скрасит.

Оценка: 7 кринжатин из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198068873944', 'num_games_owned': 464, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1604257246}
review:
超好玩hhhhh
不知道大家有没有听说过东东不死传说这个东西
那是一个国产的真人版拳皇类格斗游戏 里面的人物全都是真人照片然后一帧一帧的拼成一个个技能和动作的
人物有来自全国五湖四海的角色 操着不同当地的方言 并且技能也是各自不同且有特色的 超级有意思
而这个Streets of Fury 应该就是法国版的东东不死传说双截龙版啦
里面也有好多角色 并且出乎意料的非常流畅 尤其是模型 看起来根本就不像是照片 而是一个3d模型
再加上各种爆笑和有创意的动作和连招技能
实在是能让你的神经好好大条一会儿 好好开心一会儿hhh

author: {'steamid': '76561198044270955', 'num_games_owned': 442, 'num_reviews': 450, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1672111739}
review:
Genuinely an extremely lovable game.
I will come back to this game, when me and my friends can sit on a couch together, without wearing masks.
Why?
Because even though The Nostalgia Critic is like the best character in the game, you can probably get shit faced drunk if you take a shot every time, this goofy looking weirdo introduces himself.
I love the attention to detail, and clear fun that all the actors had while making this wild fucking ride of a game.
Bonus, this company also made Streets of Rage 4, and you can tell the love for brawlers.
BRAWLERS, NOT SMASH BROS RIP OFF's.
Which is okay because "OOPS ALL PEDOPHILES," is the name of Smash Bros right now.
No, actual brawlers, like Scott Pilgrim Vs The World The Videogame.
Bet I popped some "NOSTALGIA CRITIC"-AL BONERS WITH THAT STATEMENT.
Hah, got em.
But seriously, this game is very fun, even on the hardest difficulties, you can infinite combo the bosses, and break out of any infinite combo yourself. Goes for multiplayer too.
No curly mustaches in this fucking joint.
5 out of 7, perfect game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072465253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 219, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1605373070}
review:
이제 이 게임을 처음 알고 구입후 플레이 해보니 
격투 게임을 오래전부터 하면서 외국 게임 대회를 많이 보셨다면 어디선가 많이 본
사람들이 있다는 걸 알 수 있습니다.

실제 격투 게임 프로게이머들이 여기에 캐릭터로 등장을 했네요.

(카야네 . 라이언 하트 . 야입스 등) 

저에게는 참 신기한 부분이였습니다.

게임으로 보면 횡스크롤 게임인데 가디언 히어로즈나 팬저 밴디트 같은 라인형으로 되어 있습니다.

공격이나 콤비네이션도 꽤 괜찮게 되어 있고 퓨리라는 게이지 시스템과 스테미나를 활용한
전용 기술과 초필살기도 준비 되어 있다는 게 놀라웠고 콤보나 공중 콤보도 꽤 잘 되어 있더군요.

위기 회피기도 적당하고 가드 임팩트 등 신기한 시스템도 많고 타격감도 좋습니다.

다만,
실사를 이용한 것이다 보니 여기서 이질감과 호불호가 많이 나누어질 거 같지만
게임은 잘 만들고 괜찮다고 생각합니다.

하지만! 

어렵네요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055433233', 'num_games_owned': 1911, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1625519294}
review:
Leading up to the release of Streets of Rage 4, I noticed a post stating that Guard Rushes previous work would be on sale to celebrate, I never quite realised it was the small Xbox indie hit Streets of Fury EX, a low budget, silly parody of the beat-'em up genre.

Streets of Fury was a game I had seen in passing but forgot about being a low budget indie title, and seeing that these guys were a major part of the new streets of rage left me pretty surprised and... slightly worried.
But having given the game a shot... I am now really excited for SoR4!

Streets of Fury may have a very cheap, clunky, and almost meme-y look to it which could put people off, but the gameplay is extremely solid and fun, the characters varied and hilarious, and the character work pretty impressive and unique, there is not much like this game other than clunky playstation eye-toy games.

Unfortunately, the game does seem to be lacking in recent updates, likely as the creators have of course moved onto bigger things, and I did have to make some bindings to use a controller (which is now available in the community section), but once the controller was set up I had no issues playing.

If you are even slightly interested, I highly recommend this game, at the very least it will really make you laugh!

author: {'steamid': '76561198069038959', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1591300246}

author: {'steamid': '76561198313189000', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 552, 'last_played': 1585829452}
review:
ゲームは、キャラクターが実写取り込みの横スクロールアクション。

一般的な横スクロールアクションと異なり、ライン移動でフィールドを移動する。（ラインが存在しない（奥行きが無い）ステージも存在する）

さて、実写取り込みのゲーム、と聞くと、一定以上の年齢の方は「クソゲー」「バカゲー」を連想されるのではないだろうか？
このゲームでは半分正解である。
このゲームは、バカゲーではあるが、クソゲーではない。
バカゲーは、ゲラゲラ笑いながらプレイ出来るゲームで、ゲームプレイの楽しさだけを追求したような、ある意味ゲームらしいゲームである。
映画同様、これには2種類あって、笑いが失笑か爆笑かで雲泥の差が出る。
映画では、失笑は「B級」爆笑は「Z級」だ。
このゲームは「爆笑系」で、楽しくプレイする事を目的に狙って作られたゲームである。

自分も敵もクセのあるキャラクターだらけで、キャラの挙動を見ているだけで笑えるし、適当にボタンを押すガチャプレイでも気分爽快なコンボが出て動かしているだけで楽しい。

各キャラクターのコンボルートを理解すると更に楽しくプレイ出来る。
また、4人まで同時プレイが可能の為、みんなでワイワイとプレイする事を推奨したい。

author: {'steamid': '76561198370822284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2546, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1663012832}

Goofy and Old School styled like Moral K in the 16bit era all the way, Not family friendly for younger families but, you can turn off cursing and smash you assailants to your hearts' content with your teens and spouse! It's awesome to know that your family can kick pixel butt together. Go Team!

author: {'steamid': '76561198002696679', 'num_games_owned': 267, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 1151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 129, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1712125582}
review:
ガーディアンヒーローズっぽさがある多ライン性ベルトアクションゲームです。

どうみても馬鹿ゲーで実際そうなんですが、
やってみると多ラインベルトアクションゲームとして普通にやりがいがあって面白いです。


キャラクターの見た目どころか、性能すらも個性的でやりたい放題なため、動かすのが面白いです。
ただ敵の性能も結構やりたい放題なため、こんなバカゲーっぽい見た目してるくせに、高難易度では意外とクレバーな攻略を要求されるシーンは結構あります。
意外と好みがわかれるゲーム性かもしれません。個人的には好きでしたが。


----マルチプレイについて

ベルトアクションゲーを協力プレイすると、
二人で挟んで殴るとと細かい無敵が挟まって効率も悪いしあんまり爽快感がないとか、
吹っ飛ばしちゃったりとかしてそれぞれが別々に殴るほうが強かったりとか、
そういうのでうーんってなったりすることがあります。

が、このゲームは敵の食らい無敵時間とかそういう繊細なのは投げ捨てているし、
さらに前述の通り運動性能と攻撃判定がものすごく優れているため、
吹っ飛ばした敵を拾うのも容易だし、一人ではできない無茶なコンボを決めるのが気持ちが良いです。
でも普通のベルトアクションゲームのように味方の背後をカバーするような動きをするのもやはり重要なので、たこ殴りとカバーのどちらも強力という味付けが良い感じですね。


蘇生はたぶんありません。クレジットを消費して復活するしかありません。
でもクレジットがなくなると残っているメンバーのライフを消費してコンテニューできる形になります。
緊張感を維持しつつ、見ているだけの時間を無くすことの両立ができています。いいことですね。


個人的に我慢できない難点は、超必殺技の暗転演出が長いキャラが何人かいて、そいつがマルチプレイ中に気になることです。
技で暗転時間の格差がめちゃくちゃあるので一概には言えないのですが（一瞬で終わる技と1秒以上かかる技がある）みんなで遊ぶときは暗転が長いキャラはあんま遊ばない方がいいとおもいます。
4人で遊ぶと短いキャラでも暗転が挟まる頻度が多くなるので、2～3人ぐらいで遊ぶのがちょうどいいゲームといえるでしょう。
（あとこんなどう考えても怪しすぎるゲームに付き合ってくれる人は大切にした方がいいでしょう）

author: {'steamid': '76561198142413450', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 1256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 667, 'last_played': 1698201907}

author: {'steamid': '76561198358411456', 'num_games_owned': 415, 'num_reviews': 330, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1580481842}
review:
它不是《怒之鐵拳》續作，這是《激昂之鐵拳》！（但是《怒之鐵拳4》真的有哦！與Lizardcube共同開發，預計今年發售！前面三部曲也能夠在steam上買到）
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1984505177
[h1]優點[/h1][list]
    [*]👍動作流暢，可中途接Fury招式，一套連段打在複數敵人身上簡直爽快
    [*]👍24位角色可用，除了簡介所說的YouTuber和知名格鬥遊戲玩家以外，[strike]開發人員是不是也參雜其中？[/strike]
    [*]👍多種模式，包含本地四人大亂鬥
    [*]👍史低銅板價
 [/list][h1]缺點[/h1][list]
    [*]👎雖然有防禦和反擊手段，但混戰圍攻被破防連打到趴機會更大
    [*]👎主線偏短，Plan A+B玩完就沒
 [/list]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1984527739

author: {'steamid': '76561198108424942', 'num_games_owned': 375, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1578149906}
review:
挺不错的沙雕游戏，打击出奇的手感好，可选人物众多，各种必杀技也比较酷炫，能看到nc的客串挺惊喜的，貌似也看到了绝命毒师里的小粉，估计应该不是本人，长得挺像的。缺点也比较头疼，不能上下自由移动只能固定的三条线路，而且极度容易被怪挡住路线，其次这游戏里面的怪都是实体的而且几乎没有类型拳皇里面的逃脱翻滚技能，所以每次被怪左右夹击的时候实属无奈。
总的来说是一个不错的游戏，相当好玩，价格便宜，打折可以喜加一。

author: {'steamid': '76561198382089925', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 623, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1580042054}
review:
Un très bon beat'em up ! 
Très sympa de jouer avec des amis (local) et facile à prendre en main. ^^
De nombreux personnages sont disponibles (ex : Kayane, Bob Lennon, Benzai, ...) avec des tas de coups spéciaux.
Petit bémol : Dommage que le joueur du grenier n'est pas présent dans le jeu :'(. Et un mode "coop en ligne" ou "versus en ligne" serait pas mal.

Sinon, le jeu est simple et amusant :).
Je vous le recommande.

review: A very satisfying beat-em-up in spite of (and maybe even in part because of) its odd aesthetic. Blend Guardian Heroes with Streets of Rage and this game's own special sauce and you have something quite special indeed. If you enjoy beat-em-ups at all, you absolutely want this; if you're like me, you'll boot it up every now and again as a dependable, cathartic way to burn an hour.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048296060', 'num_games_owned': 365, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1080, 'last_played': 1667352959}
review:
With Remote Play being a thing, this game is perfect for co-op, or just duking it out between friends.

Imagine a beat-em-up game that allows you to pull fighting game combos. That's how this game plays. It's got a multitude of characters to unlock, two campaigns that allow 4 players, a multitude of challenges, and endless insanity.

If you're looking for a good game to play with friends, give this game a try. (Seriously, 4 Player Co-op is the best thing ever.)

review: More than the jokes and memes. There's a parry system, counters, air techs, and dodges for each character. I think it's pretty awesome to say you'll laugh on your first run, get better at all those systems on your second run, then get all the way to the "Big Boss" on your third. It's timeless.

author: {'steamid': '76561198208483133', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1677517313}
review: This is what was lost from the 90's arcade: Campiness & vulgar humor. Streets of Fury revitalizes this feeling, and does so with amazing sound, graphics, as well as running like a well-oiled machine even on my crappy 2016 HP. I thought I was bored with these sorts of games, but this is a lot of fun and works great on a keyboard. Definitely a hidden gem that Steam doesn't advertise well. It deserves to be recognized!

author: {'steamid': '76561198074553030', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1847, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1210, 'last_played': 1580038821}
review:
An underrated masterpiece.

The game may look stupid on that outside, but it is. The game accepts it's self for what it looks like. Beyond the stupidity of the imagery though, lies solid gameplay and a very well developed, if not comedic design of characters. This game gets far less credit than it deserves. The game has evolved in many ways that were necessary and only grown throughout the years.

A truly underrated experience.

review:
This indie title is WAY BETTER THAN ALL THE MORTAL COMBAT GAMES COMBINED.
I've got a few beat'em ups in my library but none have ever really scratched that itch. This one came out of no-where. I stumbled upon this by accident. Never seen it advertised before. It's incredibly playable, fun, addictive, funny and what all games should be like. This puts many of those premier titles to shame. I just picked i up in a sale for peanuts. This is one of the stupidest games I've ever played, but I mean that in a good way.  I got this for three dollars, and I dont like fighting games all that much....  but i'm keeping this gem.  Pick this game up when it's on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010141589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 910, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 910, 'last_played': 1558838500}
review:
TL;DR: It's great dumb fun.

Remember how the original Mortal Kombat had photos of people for fighters? It's like that. This game has a dumb story, silly characters, good soundtrack, and most importantly combat that feels on par with the best in the genre. Combos, specials, and enemy characters with their own versions thereof give the game a lot of variety. Challenges extend playtime beyond that, but even a button masher like me can get through them (mostly thanks to the inclusion of OP characters added to the game in later patches). The only real downside is that multiplayer is LOCAL ONLY, but I understand how a tiny game studio might not be able to run global servers.

All in all, this was well worth the $2 I spent when I got this at 80% off. If you think paying full price is too much for you, try the demo. It's what convinced me to give this game a chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198804682194', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1588006963}
review:
Franchement avec une bande de potes qui se numérisent façon premiers Mortal Kombat, on pouvait s'attendre au pire.
Le pire en fait, c'est que le jeu est génial à jouer.
Bravo les mecs, ça me rapelle le bon vieux temps !

Un hit sorti de nulle part. Je suis content d' être tombé dessus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198176675135', 'num_games_owned': 3350, 'num_reviews': 2843, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1547094566}
review:
[h1]向日葵游戏评分：8分（1-10）[/h1]
这款搞怪逗逼的清版动作游戏中的角色全部由真人演出，虽然关卡并不丰富，敌人的重复度也较高，但是可选角色多达24个，可能是目前可选角色最多的清版动作游戏之一，每个角色的招数都十分丰富，打击感非常强，判定也很舒服。
游戏可本地4人合作，包含故事、生存、挑战、对抗四种模式。
[h1]欢迎大家关注我们的鉴赏家：https://store.steampowered.com/curator/28763059[/h1]
[h1]关注微信公众号和头条号“向日葵游戏”获取更多资讯；官方微博：向日葵游戏评测[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561197969426053', 'num_games_owned': 1273, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 1009, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1009, 'last_played': 1535310596}
review:
Do you have any love for beat 'em ups? Any joy in punching and kicking through hordes of enemies?

How about love for absurdly done mocap? If you answered yes to any of these, buy this game. The animations are hilarious, the combat is great, the combo system is wonderful. It's worth every penny, even more if you have local friends to play it with.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001028226', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1681830756}
review:
세일해서 2100원
값어치는 당연히 충분
액션게임으로서 타격감 및 조작감 훌륭함
액션게임에서 타격감은 없어도 조작감이 떨어진다는건 있을수없는 일이나 이게임의 조작성은 매우 훌륭하당
실사의 그래픽이 매우 거슬릴수있으나 그런거 신경안써도될정도의 액션감이 넘친다.
개인적인 단점은 맵을 자유로이 이동할수있는게 아닌 라인스왑형인것 딱 이것하나
쉽게설명하면 던전드래곤같이 자유롭게 위아래 움직이는방식이 아닌
가디언히어로즈의 라인스왑형이다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040826975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 466, 'last_played': 1667611669}
review:
I must echo others in mentioning that upon first glance, this looks to be a run of the mill quirky nonsensical game. But upon actually playing it, you quickly discover that there is a surprisingly good game underneath. And just so happen, I stumbled upon the game during the Steam Winter Sale (@ $1.99) while reading about a Streets of Rage 4 update. Turns out the developer of this game will have involvement in the upcoming SOR4. Prior to reading about that, I had no knowledge of this game's existence.

It's been stated before and I'll say it again...fans of beat'em ups will not want to miss this!

author: {'steamid': '76561198388505201', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1546588630}
review: 初看画面认为是一款很傻的游戏，玩了以后更加确定了，是一款很傻的游戏，但是把我笑惨了，太欢乐了，打击感也很棒，一边笑一边游戏，真的很棒，绝对好评！！！唯一可惜是没中文看不懂

author: {'steamid': '76561198010315744', 'num_games_owned': 1309, 'num_reviews': 725, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1545782930}
review:
Recommended, but with caution...its not a bad game...given that a very small group of people made this is impressive, and they clearly had fun doing it too. You can block, parry, do combos, fill a fury bar to do special moves, many characters to choose from too. And it has 3 planes like Guardian Heroes which is cool. 

The problem is to me at least this game has the "MK3 syndrome"- you can chain together a bunch of hits but instead of doing huge damage they all do tiny increments...when its just faster and easier to do an uppercut to do the same amount of damage. And even on easy some of these enemies take a TON of hits. It makes the fighting feel shallow and unfulfilling. 

I dont like how the levels are designed either. Youll do a few screens, then it says "section complete" but you still have to follow the "GO!" arrow and walk forward to the end of the screen anyway. It fades out, introduces a short phrase about the next section, and you do it again . And again. When you finally get to the boss he doesnt really look much different than the rest of the enemies (like a boss should). On top of this they just have a HUGE chunk of health and a lot of stamina.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112691837', 'num_games_owned': 283, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1560285715}
review:
Get it.
Get this game.
Is it on sale? 
Get it twice for both you and your friend.

You want a review? Fine.

Streets of Fury EX is not only balls of fun to play with it's simple but fluid combo system but earns a few giggles from me during each stage.
If you want an unwind-y game you just found it. Despite there being plenty of difficult bits in the game they are still quite manageable even with dolt's knowledge of this game whilst delivering a big barrel of fun right into your anus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198855219858', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1535511934}
review: 很好玩的游戏，全部真人演绎，每个人都有各自的招式和必杀，招式随意组合连技，必杀也有好几种，目前更新已经有22个人物可以操作，是款用心制作的小游戏，如果有更多角色操作就更好了，希望以后有中文，有更多的人物加入进来。推荐游玩。

author: {'steamid': '76561198011915835', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1554205310}
review: Blast from the past amazing. The fighting mechanics are excellent. The cheese of each character is great! The FMV graphics area amazing. Just like a updated 90s video game. Extremly fun! Makes you wonder how it would be if Mortal Kombat used a graphic engine like this?

author: {'steamid': '76561198036648454', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1561651147}
review:
First impressions weren't great. Could only walk horizontally across a limited number of planes. Dodgy walk cycles, digitised characters...all stuff that was dead and buried years ago.  

Then you realise that it's TIGHT, fun and playable. It's silly.  The music's got that mid-90s feel to it too.

ESSENTIAL PURCHASE 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198333203171', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1542963850}
review:
Wow. I expected a mediocre and intentionally goofy game when I got this, but I gotta say, it's rather impressive. Definitely feels and plays WAY better than what you can gather from the trailers

The goofiness is definitely there, the character models and animations alone will have you giggling for a good while, but the combat is really well done too. Satisfying hits and animations, fluid combat and combo system (fun AF to explore), intuitive controls, a buttload of characters, everything is very well done.

I am so happy, I stopped mid game to drop a thumbs up, so I urge you to try that demo and see for yourself.

If you like beat 'em ups, this should be in your library

author: {'steamid': '76561198202432538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 720, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1624382423}
review: Угарный битэмап, в котором самая сильная сторона - это визуальная часть, такую красоту не часто встретишь. Коротковата, требует некоторого освоения и прокачки, но при этом приятна и реиграбельна. Есть в игре вполне явная однообразность, то это не иначе как художественный замысель создателей, вряд ли они хотели сделать игру какой-то другой. В целом, конечно, продукт на любителя, но именно любители подобного должны оценить. Отдельно хочется отметить участие Ностальгирующего Критика среди играбельных персонажей - это дорогого стоит! Подозреваю что там есть ещё кто-то из ютуб-знаменитостей, но, к сожалению, остальные не известны широкой российской публике.

author: {'steamid': '76561198854139747', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1972, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 670, 'last_played': 1598373204}

author: {'steamid': '76561198260794717', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1590114367}
review:
逆流接觸例子(得知SOR4的開發消息&Nostalgia Critic客串參戰後才開始初體驗)
結果是預料以上的好玩!!!
自玩過江西恐龍的《東東不死傳說》後
再次難得碰觸到幽默類的真人實寫風格對戰、橫捲動作類別了

雖然不太習慣三線切換、Fury招式按法的使用模式，但過一陣子就容易適應了
極推薦多人同樂，Plan A難度路線整場保證都是歡笑聲度過

author: {'steamid': '76561198000609056', 'num_games_owned': 1530, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1697831022}
review:
I didn't really like this one, It's OK because it's a beat em up but it's pretty bad. It reminds me of Bad Ass Babes on OpenBor or something. I bought it because I wanted streets of rage but I ended up getting more rage than streets. The controls are alright but the goofy characters make me say no, maybe thats part of the appeal? the dorky bad guys? maybe its purposely bad?
I didn't really get it. Most of this game is kind of a tounge in cheek humour that I think was shared by a group of friends that made the game. I'm not in that group so it seemed mostly lame. 
Id compare the way it feels like like street fighter: the movie, big digitized characters that dont really move that fluid and don't really go togeather. Plus the bad guys look like dorks.
Just no, nah, don't do it, dont buy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198208790080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1684705871}
review:
Selon moi, c'est un enfant batard entre Devil May Cry, Double Dragon et la catégorie Deviantart réservé à Bob Lennon XD
Le gameplay à base de combo est super jouissif (presque autant que le remake de Killer Instinct), l'idée des "plans" permettant de libérer de l'espace sur l'écran en cas de bukake à 4 avec ses potes est fichtrement bien penser !
Le jeu a une durée de vie ENORME et surtout le gros point fort c'est BOB LENNON, BOB LENNON PARTOUT, ON PEUX FAIRE DES MACHINIMAS AVEC LE SPRITE DE BENZAIE QUI TOUCHE SES BURNES AVEC LA DANSE DES FESSES DU LENNON !!!
Désolé, oui on a aussi Kayane, MrQuaraté (etc suivant les persos secrets et les MàJ)
Donc 10 euros pour ce jeu c'est raisonnable !

author: {'steamid': '76561198068611267', 'num_games_owned': 467, 'num_reviews': 187, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1551144496}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028193650', 'num_games_owned': 363, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1525467232}
review:
At first I was a little skeptical because of the art style. Then I saw that they were paying HELLA homage to the FGC with picks like Kayane and Ryan Hart.

And then I played the game and was like DAAAAAAAAAAAAAAMN This game NICE!. It got a sick combo system, juggles, supers, counters, dash cancels, taunt and everything in between. Super dope beat'em up that I plan to actually play the hell out of when I get back from St.Jude this week. 

That last part was probably not necessary to tell but yeah this game nice as fuck.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137761271', 'num_games_owned': 406, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3060, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1155, 'last_played': 1658416512}
review:
超讚的作品!
模仿電腦剛流行時候的真人貼圖,
加上守護者列傳的三線切換, 大亂鬥模式,
還有爽快的打擊與連段,
再加上各式各樣的致敬,
變成這款有點 kuso 又十分有趣的街頭格鬥遊戲 !

author: {'steamid': '76561197997940096', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1491495072}
review: Anyone else remember games fromt eh days of Mortal Kombat, when taking pictures of real people for sprites was the thing to do? Well, take that, but use full on recorded clips and set it in Streets of Rage, sprinkle a few real-life reviewers for extra taste and you've got a pretty fun little arcade beat 'em up. That's Streets of Fury EX. :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198047049718', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1700791242}
review: First off this game is too good to be bad! 10/10 but when after I lost all my credits and had to start all the way over I stopped playing. The game has a variety of INTERESTING characters, more interesting than Street fighter. Fuck Street Fighter. Bob Lennon is better than Ryu! and on those lonely nights you can fap to Ruby Diamond's ass. Anyway, Fly me out to the UK and make me a character!

author: {'steamid': '76561198019637676', 'num_games_owned': 389, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1508022399}
review:
This game is fantastic.  Mechanically, it's a side scrolling beat 'em up that strips out all the unnecessary complex inputs.  Instead, you're focused on combos, where you're reacting in real-time to where you've knocked the enemies.  It's really satisfying to put a nice combo together.

The art for this game is hilarious - anyone I've played with has been in stiches.  The characters all actually play in fairly different ways when you get into it.

While everyone has been nostalgic for old beat 'em ups like X-Men or Ninja Turtles, this just shows how much better games have gotten in the past few decades.  Certainly pick this up for a good co-op/party game experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084742314', 'num_games_owned': 549, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1514662949}
review:
Вам не нужен русский, что-бы получить удовольствие от этой игры. 
Не обращайте внимания на дешевизну оформления меню и интерфейса. Это как раз тот случай, когда бриллиант завернули в целлофановый пакет из-под селёдки.
Эта игра охуенная!!!
 Я вот редко это пишу. Но она обязательно в самый мрачный день вашей жизни, возьмет и поднимет вам настроение. Хоть немного, но заставит вашу унылую мордаху, расплыться в улыбке от того упоротого трэша и безумия, что тут твориться. 
Если тян вас бросила, выберите няшную азиаточку с шарфиком и смотрите, как она кавайно рвет пуканы противников своими комбо. Такие акробатические трюки персонажей, не снились даже создателям Смертельной битвы и Уличных бойцов. Графика гиперреалистична!! Сколько полигонов они пустили в персонажей, известно только Сотоне. 
Если у вас есть жирный друг. Выбирайте Жиробаса и смотрите на что способна туша сала. Возможно эта игра научит вас не насмехаться над людьми с лишним весом. 
Если ваши чувства задевают патлатые парни, то лучше не пикайте чувака с дредами, ибо его комбо завязаны на ударах по яйцам, с элементами активного доминирования над мужским началом противников. 
Продолжать можно вечно. Персонажей море. Каждый создан с любовью и безумием. Уверен, каждый найдет своего любимчика. Купите эту игру. Порадуйте себя.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040413771', 'num_games_owned': 2259, 'num_reviews': 264, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1505163796}
review:
A humourous game with a solid gameplay, OP characters and load of live-action á la classics like the Street Fighter 2 game based on the Hollywood movie, but without the bull****. 

There is a grinding aspect, but it incentives to play more of the game and there's quite a few unlockables. 

If you like Beat' em ups and you like something more silly with a Final Fight lookalike, this will definently be up your alley.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054437677', 'num_games_owned': 1070, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 732, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1690617336}
review: Streets of Fury EX is a game that harkens back to the simpler days of beat em ups with a few modern twists. They used real people to portray the characters in the story,Digitized graphics is something I miss in gaming,so that's a treat. Most of the designs of these characters are stupid and plain but the cheesyness of it brings the games charm in the looks deparment which is for the most part good and looks the part of a beat em up. However the game does faulter in the Game play. Enemies who have weapons will rush in and attack giving you NO able way of blocking or parrying (To parry most attacks in the game you have to have the reflexes of a god). Blocking is almost useless because groups of enemies will attack relentlessly until you are able to pull off a counter by which you take tons of damage before hand... I feel the game play needs tweaking because there is actually a fun experience to be had here given the issues. 4 player action, catchy sound track and some characters acting live version of Capcom and SNK characters! There is even a level up system where you gain more playable characters and there are a bunch of them. I love that idea!  The only reason I recommend it is the cheese has to be seen to believe and it's a fun little 35 min diversion (granted you don't lose all your continues by the end),but don't spend more than $5 on Streets of Fury EX. Let's hope if there is a sequel we can see some redefine game play tweaks and maybe more vareity in enemies.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036805929', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 931, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 858, 'last_played': 1551803914}
review:
I thought this would be a quickly done game that I could spend a few minutes on casually. 
But this is actually a well-made, pretty deep beat'em up.  

The controls are fluid and the humor keeps the game refreshing.  And more importantly, the combo system and wide range of characters offer lots of variety, and I found myself spending many hours on the game (mostly trying to solo the insane difficulty, which I now think is impossible).  The challenges were also very interesting.

This was a surprisingly good game for me.

ps: beware the French accents

author: {'steamid': '76561198049920173', 'num_games_owned': 967, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1653508381}
review:
[h1]Divertidisimo![/h1]

un juego al viejo estilo Beat'em up de peleas callejeras, como los clasicos streets of rage o double dragon.
en este caso mo sorprendio gratamente el sistema de combate que tiene, bastante profundo, versatil y variado. pense que iba a tener 2 botones para pegar y uno para saltar como los clasicos de siempre, pero no. ademas del genial sistema de furia, parrys, bloqueos, cada uno de los 3 botones de ataque cambia si le sumamos presionar hacia adelante, arriba o abajo, aumentando asi las posibilidades de combos variados y mayor profundidad en el combate.

lo unico negativo que le veo es que puede ser un poco corto, aunque depende cuanto lo disfrutes. el juego ademas cuenta con desbloqueables que de verdad le agregan interes y te invitan a rejugarlo. pero si te planteas terminar la "campaña" 1 ves y ya, entonces en 40-45min ya esta. y lo que mas lamento es que no tenga coop/multiplayer online. se puede jugar hasta 4 jugadores en local, de hecho, lo he aprovechado cuando tuve oportunidad y pasamos un buen momento entre amigos. pero realmente me gustaria poder jugarlo con amigos online.

en resumen, segun mi expereriencia personal:

Lo bueno:
 
- estilo interesante, fotorealista al estilo de los primeros mortal kombat.
- muchos personajes diferentes y varios desbloqueables.
- buen humor, desde los sonidos o movimientos que hacen algunos al atacar, hasta escenas y animaciones que se iran viendo durante el juego.
- sistema bastante profundo, pero facil de aprender y divertido.

Lo malo:

- No tiene Multiplayer online
- para algunos puede resultar corto

author: {'steamid': '76561198003818180', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1599, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1499431014}
review:
Streets of Fury es un beat-em-up decente, los sprites digitalizados dan mucho juego y el estilo de lucha es divertido. El mayor problema del juego es que a diferencia de muchos viejos beat-em-ups no hay armas arrojadizas ya sean palos, botellas rotas,cuchillos o incluso pistolas. Este juego tiene un montón de enemigos que te meten en cuerdas de combos ridículamente largas que tienes muy poca opción para salir de ellos. Tienes que jugar demasiado a la defensiva y no es muy divertido como en Double Dragon Neon donde tuviste el sistema Shine dodge roll. Vale la pena por un par de euros y es una diversión asegurada sobre todo si juegas con gente en cooperativo, lo dicho no es un juego muy extenso pero si se juega con gente en coop se hace bastante mas ameno el juego y las risas están aseguradas.

Nota: 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198048642146', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1541809239}

author: {'steamid': '76561198199705122', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1499070955}
review:
Bien que ce jeu soit sympathique, je ne le recommandrai qu'aux fans des youtubers/streamers présents dans ce jeu ou bien aux fans de jeux de baston/beat them all. 
Je trouve les interfaces assez sombres, une musique assez énervante, l'IA pas très compréhensible et des ennemis peu diversifiés. Autre petit bémol mais très anecdotique: Les succès.... y en a pas ça me rend triste.
La durée de vie de ce jeu est assez courte car on se lasse rapidement du tartinage de jeunes voyous.
Le Principal problème est: Le Prix, 10 euros pour un jeu de baston c'est assez cher (bon je l'ai eu à 85% j'avoue)
Petit plus: le Multijoueur qui est très bon.
Un Double Dragon est bien meilleur que ce jeu qui reste tout à fait fun entre amis mais qui reste également un délire de développeurs.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971530754', 'num_games_owned': 2278, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1552055424}
review:
思いのほかよく出来たお手軽コンボゲーム。
画面がヌルヌル動き、キャラの反応も早く動かしていて楽しい。

数年前に発売された「ビキニカラテ」とかいうおっさんホイホイゲーよりもはるかに堅実な作り。
オンライン対戦、オンラインCOOPがないのだけが残念。

author: {'steamid': '76561198015327809', 'num_games_owned': 1111, 'num_reviews': 352, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1498876543}
review: Streets of Fury is a decent beat-em-up, the digitized sprites give the game a lot of goofy charm and the fighting game style combat is fun. The biggest problem with the game though is unlike a lot of old beatemups there is no desperation move that gets enemies off of you. So this game just loves having a bunch of enemies getting you into ridiculously long combo strings that you have very little option to get out of. There are tech rolls and counters but they take long to build so you just watch your health melt away. Enemies just love dropping down from the top of the stage and cheap shotting you, a sin many old beatemups never had. You have to play way too defensively and they don't do it in a fun way like Double Dragon Neon where you had the Shine dodge roll system. It's worth a couple of bucks and is a fun for a while, but its utter punishment of any real offensive play drags it down.

review: I play this game with my grandson when I'm trying to avoid my husband. This game is so much fun unlike my good for nothing husband who drinks all day in the garage. I tried to get him to play with me but he said "shut up Fran and make me a sandwhich." Well I gave him a knuckle sandwhich, and now I live alone on food stamps. At least I can play this game with my grandson. Oh It also doesn't require AOL internet so you can play it even when you can't afford internet. He always could afford beer though. I enjoy this game thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067335468', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1496271805}
review:
誰がこんな丁寧に作れと言った！？（笑）

非常によくできたベルトスクロールアクションです。ゲーム中に差し込まれた親切なチュートリアルに軽快な操作性、難しくは無いが相手を見た個別対応が必要な敵キャラ、ケイブSTGのように寛容なコンボ連鎖など、快適に楽しく遊べる要素が盛り沢山です！

author: {'steamid': '76561198053788253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 806, 'last_played': 1596515935}
review:
Pros:
-Multiple Characters that have their own style of fighting
-Enemy types that are different to one another 
-Combos to keep the pace going

Cons:
-Sometimes the can be relentless in a bad way since in some parts you will be surrounded and will be juggled constantly to the point I couldn't jump to the next line no matter how many times you tech jump and air super they always come back right at the time you were about to change lanes
-The campaign is short

What I wished it could be in:
-add more special attacks when it comes to arial combos rather than some
-and a Mega Crash ability that could be use to blast enemies far away, but uses 2 fury bars
-as an option (wall bounce to keep the combo going)
-air dash/dodge

The first time I played it was great couple of hours later it was meh it was okay due to the down sides.

Overall it was good just buy it during a sale.

I bought it at full price.

Anyway aside from that it was fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026522724', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 1443, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 639, 'last_played': 1689385566}
review:
** Pure Unbridled Fun **

Old digitized actor fighting games tended to have a lot of things in common - they looked ridiculous, were expensive to make & play, and weren't very fun.

Streets of Fury EX is what you get if you only left in the ridiculous, focused on fun, and actually made a good game.

Pick from a large cast of people, many obviously average individuals hamming it up on camera, hit the streets and beat the crap out of a huge number of people in the most over-the-top ways possible, all while maintaining a fun, free-style combo system that's surprisingly deep and satisfying.

Reminding me a lot of Guardian Heroes with it's three-lane combat and the ability to continue to juggle the limp bodies of your defeated enemies until they explode (yup) this is a cooperative brawling game with the options that should make anyone who loves fun happy.

Want to learn a character or blow off steam?  Set it to Easy and enjoy 99 continues.  If you every want to enable friendly fire, this is the mode to do it in.

Want more of a challenge?  Set it Normal; you'll need a basic understanding of the core mechanics to survive.

Know the game really well?  Set it to hard -- only people with solid knowledge of the game's mechanics can complete the campaigns.

The range of characters go from a Streetfighter/Art of Fighting type, to a dry-humping Frenchman with dreadlocks that hurls a barrage of VHS tapes but they've all got different styles, strengths and the ability to string together fantastic combos.

Don't let the silliness fool you; the game's mechanics are surprisingly deep with a super meter (for Fury attacks), Guard meters (broken through repeated hits), parries (which stun enemies when times right), and Stamina (used for Special attacks) plus a less-broken Combo Breaker counter if you're hit too many times.

Each character has 3 basic attack buttons (normal, launcher, special) and each button provides a string of 4 different attack patterns, each with different uses.  

Game play is centered around stringing together combos and juggling enemies so you don't get overwhelmed, using normal attacks to give your Stamina time to recharge and then launching into Furries for limited invulnerability.  Each type of enemy (except bosses) have a limited moveset but special properties, and stages are well designed, switching up the action from simple beat-downs on a large mob to dealing with smaller numbers of special-property enemies that require utilizing the mechanics taught earlier to deal with.  (Example:  Super-armour enemies with a very slow guard-breaking attack that need hit-and-run tactics, or aggressive enemies that are better dealt with via parry)  The game also rewards bold tactics, such as using the Parry to thwart a small area-afffect guard-breaking blast.

Throw in Survival, Challenges (which really test how well you've learned mechanics) and you have a very solid fighter that other more serious fighters wish they were.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010752029', 'num_games_owned': 1658, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 3317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2631, 'last_played': 1643701993}
review: Underrated and overlooked gem of a game. This is the best beat em' up out there, period. It's well balanced, lots of different characters to unlock, fighting styles for all tastes, "easy to get into but hard to master" complex combo system, game is highly customisable as well. It's good for both playing competitively and if you just want to relax and fool around. This game may look corny and bad on surface but it's actually hilarious, geniously constructed and self aware. Sadly, if you want multiplayer, devs are already working their asses off on other stuff and multiplayer is probably the last priority here. Still, i highly suggest that you support these guys because there's plenty of content and replayability as it is. I got my 40 hours just doing singleplayer missions over and over again with different customisable options. Frankly, i can't come up with any reason that you should not buy this game, only some minor nitpicks and lack of multiplayer, that's it. But, if you're here only because of the multiplayer, all i can say is "Come back in 10 years".

author: {'steamid': '76561198042259317', 'num_games_owned': 4316, 'num_reviews': 414, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1483019728}
review:
There is certainly fun to be had here for lovers of the Beat 'em Up genre. It's not to be taken too seriously and it's "cheap production value" and classic Mortal Kombat-esque sprites is part of the charm. The game play shows similarities to Phantom Breaker: Battle Ground (input a command to switch planes) and various fighting games in terms of combat. There are tons of playable characters, including the Nostalgia Critic and Benzaie from ThatGuyWithTheGlasses.com that are unlocked as you perform combos to increase your Security Level. 

Combat wise, you have a variety of "Mash X" string combos that change based on the direction you are holding. The Y button provides various launchers that also function based on the direction you're holding. The B button actions like the Smash Bros games as well, providing different special moves like travel attacks, slide kicks and dragon punches. The game doesn't tell you this, but doing the down B attack (or the B attack) in the air can sometimes do a sort of dive kick, which can be handy in dealing damage and continuing combos. Finally, there are "fury" moves which act like supers from a fighting game. Both you and enemies can block and be guard crushed, and after being attacked too much, either of you can perform an unblockable counter (even as you're dying!), though, enemies don't do it too often. 

You can string these moves together, in silly, spammy, but bombastic combos. However, some enemies can resist being stunlocked/interuppted and perform a powerful attack that will set you up to take more damage or be juggled. I can't quite always say the game is fair. One the one hand, you can batter the enemies in an almost Dynasty Warriors style fashion, and it takes learning of the enemy behaviors to really maximize your dominance. On the other hand, you can easily get stun locked and juggled to oblivion, especially by some of the more annoying enemies like the "Drop kicking cornrow F**ker" or "nunchuck slinging b**ches". There are many places I dread in the first act (which I can't beat the last boss on :( ) because I'm expecting to loose 3/4th of my health to a handful of enemies.  (though, some playable characters might handle them better than others, you have to unlock them though).


These unfair moments hold me from seriously suggesthing this game. I had fun with it, and not a terrible buy at sale, but I don't recommend it if you're looking for a good brawler that you want to finish. Maybe get it on sale to experience for an hour or so, or spend hours getting good at it, which seems preposterous for it's corny nature.
